price: Dájúdájú A ti sọ tírà kan kalẹ̀ fún yín, tí ìrántí nípa ọ̀rọ̀ ara yín wà nínú rẹ̀. Nítorí náà, ṣé ẹ ò ṣe làákàyè ni?
arabic: لَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فِيهِ ذِكۡرُكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad anzalnā ilaykum kitāban fīhi dhik'rukum afalā taʿqilūna
